title: New Pixel 4a. SMS "Not sent" error on all text messages & Carrier has no solution
content:
I have set up my new Pixel 4a, and it works well with strong signal coverage, with no issues receiving text messages. However, every time I try to send a SMS to any number, I get the "Not sent. Tap to try again" message.

I've cleared the cache and data numerous times (and rebooted), I've checked/updated the SMSC number, and spent ages with the carrier trying to resolve the problem - and they're at a loss.  No matter what I do, the problem persists.

Anything else I can try? Thanks!
